summary: Encapsulates a UniSpeech self‑supervised speech model adapted for Connectionist Temporal Classification, offering a forward pass and utilities to lock specific sub‑modules such as the base network, feature encoder, and extractor, as well as to share weights across layers.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate a high‑accuracy, configurable speech‑to‑text component into products like transcription services, voice assistants, and automated captioning systems, while allowing fine‑tuning control over model parts.
